Legal_Issue: Whether the defendants' allegations raise a genuine issue for trial regarding patent infringement and validity
Evidence_Assessment: Expert evidence on infringement; affidavits and expert opinions reviewed
Burden_of_Proof: On plaintiffs to show infringement; on defendants to show invalidity
Credibility_Factor: Conflicts over invention origin and prior disclosure
Legal_Rule: Summary judgment is granted if no genuine issue exists for trial
Standard_of_Review: No genuine issue for trial (Federal Court Rules, Rule 216)
Procedural_Issue: Suitability of issues for summary judgment
Grounds_for_Claim: Infringement of claims 1 and 10 of the patent
Outcome_on_Merits: Infringement established for claims 1 and 10; validity remains in dispute
Review_Standard: Summary judgment standard under Federal Court Rules
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Court considered all affidavits and expert opinions before ruling
Key_Evidence_Considered: Expert evidence on infringement, affidavits, prior art arguments
Legal_Framework: Federal Court Rules, Rule 216; Patent Act provisions on novelty, disclosure, inventorship
Applicant_Challenge: Plaintiffs sought summary judgment on infringement and validity
Court_Result: Plaintiffs succeeded partially on infringement; trial required on anticipation and prior inventorship
Legal_Rule_Source: Federal Court Rules, Rule 216; Patent Act
Defendant_Response: Alleged prior art invalidates the patent; challenged inventorship and disclosure
Remedy_Requested: Summary judgment on infringement and validity
Outcome: Partial summary judgment: infringement upheld, validity issues to trial
Remedy_Sought: Declaration of infringement, invalidity defense rejected
Legal_Provision: Patent Act – novelty, disclosure, inventorship; Federal Court Rules – Rule 216
Legal_Provision_Cited: Patent Act; Federal Court Rules, Rule 216
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Prior art, lack of novelty, prior disclosure
Applicable_Process: Summary judgment process under Federal Court Rules
Outcome_of_Review: Infringement confirmed on claims 1 and 10; validity challenges require trial
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Trial on anticipation and prior inventorship
